string.value: You're now a Bowman! Now what? Perhaps #b#p1012100##k can help you.
#p1012100# suggests monster hunting as a form of basic training. She wants you to hunt #r16 #o210100#s#k. #o210100#s can be easily found near #m100000000#.\n\n#o210100# #r#a21361##k
You eliminated 16 #o0210100#s and reported that #p1012100#. Too easy. What's next?

젊은 궁수여. 초보자에서 벗어났지만 아직은 어려움이 더 많을 거라 생각 되어요. 당신 스스로의 힘으로 전투를 하는 것이 쉽지 않겠군요. 당신을 위해 당신의 수련에 약간의 지침을 마련해줄까 하는데... 어떤가요? 수련을 해보겠나요?
#L0# #b수련을 하겠습니다.#l 

#L1# 스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있습니다. #I
스스로의 한계를 인정할 줄 아는 마음이야말로, 더 강해지기 위한 바탕이 되지요. 당신을 강하게 만들어 드리겠어요.
스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있다니 대견하군요. 당신의 성장을 지켜보겠어요.

Young Bowman! You are no longer a beginner. I guess you still have many difficulties. It's hard to fight by yourself, isn't it? I can show you some guidelines for your training. What do you say? Would you like to go for it?
#L0# #bI want to be trained.#l 

#L1# I can do it by myself. #I
Accepting your limit will make you stronger. I'll make you stronger.
It's good that you can train by yourself. I'll see how you improve.

You're not familiar with controlling a bow. It's better to hunt #o0210100# and learn how to hunt. Please go and hunt #rsixteen #o0210100##k.#o0210100# live near #m100000000# town. It's easy to find them.
You're not ready to be trained.
You killed 16 #o0210100#. Good. You can't be stronger if you're happy with this. It is just first step as a Bowman.
I'll call you when you need another training session. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
You haven't eliminated #rsixteen #o0210100##k yet. Try hard if you want to be stronger.
